评论概述: Far too small. Chintzy material. Not at all close to size in the chart
评论详情: This is something for small children. It's material is almost like the fuzzy inside of a hoodie. The size chart is completely off, the sleeves were too thin and too short. There was no shoulder room. I thought I was the Hulk trying this on.

评论概述: the size chart is not accurate.
评论详情: did not fit and followed the size chart. cheaply made.

I was really looking forward to this jacket for a LARP that I was going to go to but the 5XL jacket that says it fits up to 154cm or 60.63 inches in the bust area would not even fit my friend who wears a normal XL. The tag says it's a 5XL, but I hope it was just mislabeled. Just to explain, my friend's bust size is 42 inches and my chest size is 56 inches. I ordered it bigger since I was going to wearing layers underneath it.
The material is a soft, satin type.  This jacket is just fashionable and not meant to be used as a protective covering for the cold, as it has no insulative properties. It is perfect for Halloween.
